titles.title: To designate the United States courthouse located at 2500 Tulare Street in Fresno, California, as the "Robert E. Coyle United States Courthouse".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Economic Development, Public Buildings and Emergency Management.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

committee.subcommittee: Economic Development, Public Buildings and Emergency Management
committee.name: House Transportation and Infrastructure

bill.summary: 2/9/2005--Introduced. Designates the U.S. courthouse at 2500 Tulare Street in Fresno, California as the "Robert E. Coyle United States Courthouse." Makes this Act effective on the date that Senior Judge Robert E. Coyle relinquishes or otherwise ceases to hold a position as an Article III judge.
